'''Fantastic Four''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete a [[Domain]] using 4 characters of the same Elemental Type.

==Notes==
*Obtainable in Single-player mode only.
*Story Domain/Trial characters will not count.

==Trivia==
*This achievement's name is a reference to the {{w|Fantastic Four|eponymous superhero group}} created by {{w|Marvel Comics}}.
